description: The classic, wrought-iron outdoor dining space at this restaurant overlooks one of the most romantic little squares in Italy, while the view takes in the promontory dominated by its castle – a picture-postcard view that is famous around the world. The experienced Cerea family from the famous three-starred Michelin Da Vittoria restaurant in Bergamo are at the helm, serving consistently top-quality cuisine whether you’re here for a quick lunch or a gourmet dinner. It’s best to book ahead as the few tables are much in demand!
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Great view, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus, Terrace, Wheelchair access
